lead_paragraph: Lawmakers have argued that an extra hour of afternoon sunlight would have social and health benefits and help the nation save millions on electricity.

headline.print_headline: Push to Tweak Time Zone Gains Momentum in Spain
headline.main: Push to Tweak Time Zone Gains Momentum in Spain

snippet: Lawmakers have argued that an extra hour of afternoon sunlight would have social and health benefits and help the nation save millions on electricity....
